## ParticleEmitterOptions.orientationFixedRotation property

The fixed rotation of emitted particles in degrees (x, y, z) when orientation is 'fixed'. Defaults to (0, 0, 0).

**Signature:**

```typescript
orientationFixedRotation?: Vector3Like;
```
